_header: Lief men this beth the ten hest
_description: A note on the Ten Commandments — eight couplets

BodHat26.First Lines:
Leue men þis beoþ þe þen hesteþat of whilg
                    hilg of husholden owe yse feste…
BodHat26.Last Lines:
…þere is chele & hete hunger & sting þurst &
                    dunt& wurm & woning & ceres monye eure among
